resources.string:
The symptoms of COVID-19 are similar to common illnesses such as a cold or influenza. You may have one or more of the following: 
 
- a new or worsening cough 
- fever (at least 38˚C) 
- shortness of breath 
- a sore throat 
- sneezing and runny nose 
- temporary loss of smell 
 
Shortness of breath is a sign of possible pneumonia and requires immediate medical attention.
 
Some people may present with less typical symptoms such as only: fever, diarrhoea, headache, myalgia (muscle pain), nausea/vomiting, or confusion/irritability.
 
Symptoms can take up to 14 days to show after a person has been infected. The virus can be passed onto others before they know they have it – from up to two days before symptoms develop.
 
If you have these symptoms call Healthline (for free) on 0800 358 5453 or your doctor immediately.

The myBubble app generates a unique, anonymous ID number for every installation. When communicating with myBubble\'s Cloud Service, only the ID number and a timestamp are transmitted. \n \nThe myBubble app collects GPS location data solely for the purpose of generating your personal timeline. No location data is transmitted to or stored by myBubble\'s Cloud Service.

myBubble utilise three key components of your smartphone to conduct effective contact tracing. 
 
1: Bluetooth is used to record encounters with other smartphone devices with this app installed they must have the app running with Bluetooth enabled as well. Should one user not have Bluetooth enabled then the system breaks down. 
 
2: Location Services are used to keep a record of where you have been locally. Note this data is only ever stored locally and is for your personal use so that you do not have to manually log where you have been. 
 
3: WIFI/Internet, should you ever come into close contact with someone else using the app that encounter is recorded. Should any of those encounters be confirmed as a COVID case then you will need Internet access to receive a notification informing you.

string.name: tap_here_for_more_info
string.u: Tap here to get more information

resources.string: Please remember to wear a mask and practice social distancing to keep yourself and your bubble safe.
If you are infectious, please stay isolated and quarantine yourself for at least two weeks to prevent the spread and protect those around you.
